entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:22 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 5:18 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: E 11 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
